ai-atk-s0508a24:153_0: the training precepts of livelihood is included in the higher morality; about livelihood is well-proclaimed for the sake of livelihood; and the one who fulfills the training precepts in the way already stated, but the training proclaimed by livelihood; and those who live in dependence on the Buddha fulfilling the training according to fellows in their livelihood; and those who fulfill the training proclaimed by the essence with livelihood.
ai-atk-s0508a24:153_1: Then he shows that he is established in the Pātimokkha.
ai-atk-s0508a24:153_3: The meaning is that it is given in the Vibhaṅga thus: “He is mindful, discerning that is well-proclaimed, the meaning is, and the elimination of mindfulness” , and so on.
ai-atk-s0508a24:153_4: In this way the recitation of the Monastic Code is shown by Pātimokkha restraint, and of the Pātimokkha it is said: “Now, the elder is the fourth, it is far from the highest practice.”
